problem_summary_simple: Find the max difference between a character with odd frequency and one with even frequency.
problem_summary_technical: Count character frequencies, then find the maximum odd frequency and minimum even frequency to calculate the difference.
key_insights: A frequency map (or array for fixed alphabet size) is efficient for counting.
The problem guarantees at least one odd and one even frequency character.
Iterate through frequencies to find the maximum odd and minimum even values.
